channel.title: Hyperion Question
channel.description: Okay im using jinrake's source pvp world 459 and am having some problems : When a npc is attacked with mage and killed with mage only (if range or melee is used at anytime it will drop) there is no drop. There is no errors and i have tried with mutiple npc's all of which do not work im thinking that it dose not send the npc death right ? i mean the npc is dying and respawning but if killed with mage it dose not tell it to drop ?

item.title: Hyperion Question
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:2, topic:436817”]Is there a drops.cfg file, and is the npchandler linking to it?
if there is, it might be a format issue.[/quote]
possibly ive looked into it but still it seems illogical dror it to be a format issue if it was i dont think the npc wuld drop anything upon death at all but it just dose not drop when killed with mage only

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion Question
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

Is there a drops.cfg file, and is the npchandler linking to it?
if there is, it might be a format issue.
